services.title: Our Services
services.adminNotice: ‚úÖ You are logged in as administrator. You can manage services and pricing.
services.comprehensiveSolution: Comprehensive solutions for all your language and legalization needs.
services.negotiableNote: Note: The prices above are subject to change and can be negotiated.
services.translationStandardDesc: The translation standard is calculated based on the translated result with the format:
services.bilingualNote: * NOTE: For translations into two languages, the price is added according to the translation price list above.
services.alertDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
services.interpreterSimultaneousDesc: The interpreter translates as quickly as possible while the speaker is talking, ideal for conferences and large events.
services.interpreterConsecutiveDesc: The interpreter speaks after the speaker stops, suitable for meetings, negotiations, or tours.
services.legalizationDesc: We handle document legalization processes to various state institutions such as the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and foreign embassies in Jakarta.
services.apostilleDesc: An Apostille Certificate demonstrates the validity of the document's origin and the signature of the official who legalized it, including diplomas, birth certificates, divorce decrees, powers of attorney, or other documents related to civil cases.
services.paymentDesc: Payment can be made as follows:
services.paymentMethod1: Cash payment upon delivery of the translation results.
services.paymentMethod2: Payment via bank transfer to the account listed on the INVOICE/RECEIPT. For more details, please <contactLink>contact us</contactLink>.

homepage.heroDescription: Document translation services, certified translator services, sworn translator, interpreter, apostille and legalization services.
homepage.documentTranslationDesc: Including sworn (legal) translation for official documents such as diplomas, certificates, & company documents, as well as non-sworn translation for books, manuals, & technical materials.
homepage.interpretingDesc: Providing experienced interpreters for seminars, meetings, training, and foreign technician assistance. Native speakers and Indonesian citizens who have lived abroad are available.
homepage.legalizationDesc: Handling document legalization processes to various state institutions such as Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, to foreign embassies in Jakarta.
homepage.apostilleDesc: Document authentication for validation in 121 member countries of the Apostille Convention, including diplomas, birth certificates, and business documents for international recognition.
homepage.mostRequestedDocs: Most Frequently Requested Documents for Apostille
homepage.mostRequestedDocsDesc: Apostille certificates received by the Directorate General of AHU Ministry of Law and Human Rights are mostly notarial documents related to business activities, educational documents such as diplomas and transcripts, and civil documents such as birth certificates and marriage certificates.
homepage.notaryDocsDesc: Related to business and legal company activities
homepage.civilDocsDesc: Birth certificates, marriage certificates, family cards
homepage.readyToUseDesc: Contact us now for a free consultation regarding your document needs.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Welcome to our website HAWATRANS.ID, a sworn and non-sworn language translator service office in Jakarta. We are a provider of professional Translation, Apostille, and Document Legalization services. We are a professional and experienced translation office in various fields of language and documents, for both oral translation (interpreting) and Document Translation/Legalization. We provide translation services for company documents and personal documents.
aboutPage.advantage1Desc: Our sworn translator team is highly qualified and has extensive experience.
aboutPage.advantage2Desc: Serving diverse translation needs for various types of documents and languages.
aboutPage.advantage3Desc: We are committed to punctuality and reliability in every project.
aboutPage.advantage4Desc: Offering premium quality services at affordable and transparent prices.
aboutPage.advantage5Desc: Free pickup and delivery service for your time efficiency (terms apply).
